content.description:
This is a fun route with great stone, would be 4 stars if it were a touch longer. Definitely worrth the longish walk down teamed up with the others at this seldom visited crag.  

  Fun pocket climbing through the blonde streak will take you to a rad sidepull/tips crack feature splitting nice black rock.
content.location: Right of the .12 and left of a project. This route is also listed as a project in Cronins book

content.description: Great moves! Good stone! Oddly enough, rests don't come easy on this one unless you really know what to do. Killer layback sequence towards the top.

climbs.name: Lust
climbs.fa: Bolted by Ed Engler/FA Lee Terveen

content.description: If you have a desire for good holds, get on this one. An elevated heart rate and heavy breathing is guaranteed.
Sick, fun climbing that will make you yearn for more and more and more. The holds can get a bit stingy at the beginning, middle and end.
content.location: Left hand route on right hand wall.

content.description: A decent warm-up with pretty good face climbing and nice holds. Enjoy life right up until your face turns green at the end when you discover you don't have what you want after all.
content.location: Far right climb on the right hand wall.

content.description: At the farthest left hand side of The Mohican is a small, but tempting area with 7 routes that will make you sweat, bleed and cry. Come visit a level of personal hell that will make you realize that pain and pleasure are one in the same. Repent, sinner, these are all routes with your number on them. Come enjoy these tasty, little indulgences.
